# `select_feature_info`

Select feature info


## Description

Select feature info


## Usage

```r
select_feature_info(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_feature_info`](#getfeatureinfo)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("feat_type")), list("feature type (e.g. \"rna\", \"dna\", \"protein\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("set_defaults")), list("set default spat_unit and feat_type. Change to FALSE only when")), "\n", "  ")
